name: Vegan Cereal
description: Start the day off right with this homemade vegan cereal. It's very easy to make, nicely spiced with cinnamon, and loaded with healthy nuts and seeds. You can serve it with plant-based yogurt or milk and fresh fruits for a delicious and healthy breakfast!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 300 °F.  In a large bowl, combine the rolled oats, the cinnamon, the vanilla extract, and the maple syrup.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat your oven to 300 °F.  In a large bowl, combine the rolled oats, the cinnamon, the vanilla extract, and the maple syrup.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir until well combined. The mixture will be pretty sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir until well combined. The mixture will be pretty sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the rolled oat maple syrup mixture on top. Spread evenly. Bake for 8-10 minutes at 300 °F. Check regularly to avoid burning. The oats burn pretty quickly and every oven is a bit different. They should be lightly golden on top.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the baked oats with the chia seeds, the coconut sugar, the sunflower seeds, the pumpkin seeds, the almonds, and the shredded coconut.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir until well combined. Serve with fresh fruits, plant-based yogurt, or milk.
